title: Am I an idiot? Find the type of bread you are.

openQuestions.question: Write a basic while loop that stops when the incremented variable is divisible by 14. Consider the variable (i of type int) initialized with random value.

closeQuestions.question: Choose the correct array declaration method.
What does this pointer point to? int (*fpa())[]
incorrectAnswers: an array of functions returning int pointers
an array of pointers to functions returning an int
a function returning an array of int pointers
